attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current:
I face problems head-on. A simple, direct solution is the best path to success.

I can stare down a hell hound without flinching.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: Greater Good. Our lot is to lay down our lives in defense of others. (Good)

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: Someone saved my life on the battlefield. To this day, I will never leave a friend behind.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: I’d rather eat my armor than admit when I’m wrong.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MUE7qkgZwKohVTLlZkN_description
attribs.current: You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MUE7qki1MW-7qAZME1S_description
attribs.current: When you roll a 1 or 2 on a damage die for an attack you make with a melee weapon that you are wielding with two hands, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll, even if the new roll is a 1 or a 2. The weapon must have the two-handed or versatile property for you to gain this benefit.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MUE7qkkqx-jbm1jNWvs_description
attribs.current:
OFFICER
You have a military rank from your career as a soldier. Soldiers loyal to your former military organization still recognize your authority and influence, and they defer to you if they are of a lower rank. You can invoke your rank to exert influence over other soldiers and requisition simple equipment or horses for temporary use. You can also usually gain access to friendly military encampments and fortresses where your rank is recognized.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MUE7qkmj4PVRgajIDzn_itemname
attribs.current: Trophy Taken from a Fallen Enemy

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MUE7qkoLi4QqqHepx8U_itemcontent
attribs.current: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows. The suit includes gauntlets.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MUE7qkoLi4QqqHepx8V_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d6, Damage Type: Piercing

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MUE7qkoLi4QqqHepx8W_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Piercing

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MUE7qkoLi4QqqHepx8X_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d6, Damage Type: Slashing, Range: 20/60,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MUE7qkpUe5FoDnAZ-FN_itemcontent
attribs.current: A backpack can hold one cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear. You can also strap items, such as a bedroll or a coil of rope, to the outside of a backpack.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MUE7qkqq2NZxJCOrHx0_itemcontent
attribs.current: This tin box contains a cup and simple cutlery. The box clamps together, and one side can be used as a cooking pan and the other as a plate or shallow bowl.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MUE7qkqq2NZxJCOrHx1_itemcontent
attribs.current: This small container holds flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a torch - or anything else with abundant, exposed fuel - takes an action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MUE7qkqq2NZxJCOrHx2_itemcontent
attribs.current: A torch burns for 1 hour, providing bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. If you make a melee attack with a burning torch and hit, it deals 1 fire damage.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MUE7qkqq2NZxJCOrHx2_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Adventuring Gear, Damage: 1, Damage Type: Fire, Range: 20/40

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MUE7qkqq2NZxJCOrHx3_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MUE7qkqq2NZxJCOrHx4_itemcontent
attribs.current: A waterskin can hold up to 4 pints of liquid.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MUE7qkqq2NZxJCOrHx5_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

attribs.name: additional_feature_and_traits
attribs.current: One-Handed: Mary Tanner recently lost her right arm from the shoulder down.

attribs.name: character_backstory
attribs.current: During the ongoing fight with the newly awaken Demon Lord, Mary Tanner headed towards the capital ready to defend humanity. She was in a skirmish against one of the Demon Lord's Generals, Alizet. She challenged Alizet and realized the immense gap in their power as he effortlessly destroyed her arm. It was all she could do to evade a killing blow and run away.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MUxQ7uTA9aKoCRwSyrU_description
attribs.current:
Starting at 2nd level, you can push yourself beyond your normal limits for a moment. On your turn, you can take one additional action on top of your regular action and a possible bonus action.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MUxTiPpQMkQrsehJTdA_itemcontent
attribs.current: Place card somewhere (including thrown). As long as card is not moved and the user if within 300ft. an illusion of an Ogre appears above the card. The illusion behaves like a normal Ogre.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MW9eecqWnRF9a6aI3iS_itemproperties
attribs.current: This belt pouch appears empty and has 10 charges. While holding the pouch, you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges, speak the name of any nonmagical food seasoning (such as salt, pepper, saffron, or cilantro), and remove a pinch of the desired seasoning from the pouch. A pinch is enough to season a single meal. The pouch regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MW9eecqWnRF9a6aI3iS_itemcontent
attribs.current: Wondrous item, common  This belt pouch appears empty and has 10 charges. While holding the pouch, you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges, speak the name of any nonmagical food seasoning (such as salt, pepper, saffron, or cilantro), and remove a pinch of the desired seasoning from the pouch. A pinch is enough to season a single meal. The pouch regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn.
